attributes.action: tax wealthy companies who replace UK workers with offshore workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a growing trend for wealthy companies to offshore their UK workforce to cheap labor overseas, resulting in UK residents being made redundant.

The cost of this ultimately is paid for by the British tax payer, why should we cover the cost whilst these companies make greater profits.

government_responses.details:
